definitions: The action of providing food or drink.
The action of performing duties or services for someone or something.
The action of spending a period of time in a particular role or place, especially in prison or the military.
The action of hitting a ball to start a point in sports like tennis or volleyball.
examples: He is serving a life sentence.
She is serving dinner to the guests.
The company is serving its customers well.
He is serving in the army.
